title: ObjMark

technicalDetails.problemStatement: Creating bounding box image datasets on the go was near impossible with existing tools. I needed an offline mobile annotation tool that was quick and straight-forward to use.
issues: Google ML-Kit limitations: bounding boxes are only accurate with objects clearly in view ~ adjusting pre drawn boxes is still faster than drawing them all manually
technicalDetails.whatILearned: ML-Kit has a robust set of on-device models that can be leveraged for offline AI applications. Integrating Google AI models with mobile apps can significantly enhance functionality while maintaining user privacy.
technicalDetails.differentNextTime: I would explore additional on-device models and possibly implement a feedback loop to improve annotation accuracy over time based on user corrections.

description: Annotate images for computer vision datasets using AI assistance offline. This mobile app leverages on-device machine learning to streamline the annotation process, making it faster and more efficient.

title: SortxPort

technicalDetails.problemStatement: Thousands of family photos mixed wiht memes and screenshots made it nearly impossible to find specific images when needed. Existing solutions lacked natural language search capabilities and required manual sorting.

description: Sort then export your vast image library with natural language queries in a controlled environment. Langchain LCEL-powered backend provides the ability to search, categorize, and organize images effortlessly.

title: Manufacturing Code Date Agent
description: Demo of a mildly agentic chain for analyzing packaging code dates live. The agent compares historical records, asseses code date, and determines what action to take for the least financial impact.

title: Chargur
description: Built in 13 days entirely within bolt.new for the world's largest hackathon, Chargur is one  of the first early prototypes for a UI-UX Agent. Think figma meets Copilot but for designing user interfaces with AI assistance. it was built using a custom agentic framework that I developed specifically for this project. The agent system utilizes structured output to control the app's stages to help the user progess through the design process.

title: Resume-AI
description: An AI-driven resume builder that helps users create professional resumes effortlessly. Utilizes NLP to optimize content and format for job applications.
